member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.Interop.Serialization.IPersistentFormatDeserializer
member.summary: Persistent format deserializer interface.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Psi.Interop.Serialization.IPersistentFormatDeserializer.DeserializeRecords(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Deserialize stream of messages and originating time stamps.
member.returns: Sequence of dynamic of primitive or IEnumerable/ExpandoObject of primitive as well as originating time stamp.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Psi.Interop.Serialization.IPersistentFormatSerializer
member.summary: Persistent format serializer interface.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Psi.Interop.Serialization.IPersistentFormatSerializer.PersistHeader(System.Object,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Persist header data (if any).
member.remarks: This is called once at the start of each persisted partition/file.
member.param: Stream of serialized bytes along with delimiter or length-prefix.
member.returns: State object of any type; handed back on calls below, simplifying stateless implementation.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Psi.Interop.Serialization.IPersistentFormatSerializer.PersistRecord(System.Object,System.DateTime,System.Boolean,System.IO.Stream,System.Object)
member.summary: Persist single serialized message with originating time stamp.
member.remarks: This is called once per message.
member.param: Flag indicating whether this is the first record; useful for delimiters in some formats.
Stream of serialized bytes along with delimiter or length-prefix.
State object of any type; previously returned by header call above.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Psi.Interop.Serialization.IPersistentFormatSerializer.PersistFooter(System.IO.Stream,System.Object)
member.summary: Persist footer data (if any).
member.remarks: This is called once upon termination of data stream.
member.param: Stream of serialized bytes along with delimiter or length-prefix.
State object of any type; previously returned by header call above.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

The deserializer to use to deserialize messages.
